survey_name: Public Wi-Fi Usage and Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand user experiences and satisfaction levels with public Wi-Fi services in urban areas.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use public Wi-Fi in a typical week?
questions.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.
